reporting-org.narrative: Ministry for Foreign Affairs of Finland

title.narrative: F.a: Empowering Adivasis through Community Rights and Community Resource Management

description.narrative: The main activities of this project are: 1) Climate Change- follow up of lantana training, raising of agro and fruit yielding plants for adivasis and livestock?s, training on repair of solar lamps, 2) Eco-village designing, 3) Organic farming + demo seed b ank, 4) Rejuvenating species of herbal, fruit and food plants, 5) Creating leadership and skill development training, 6) Creating awareness about herbal medicines, establishing herbal nursery, preparation of herbal medicines and distribution, 7) Follow up on Community Rights under FRA, Adivasi Parliament and 5th schedule, 8) Advocacy + Lobbying, 9) Documentation audio, video, electro and electronic media.
